ResyncNewsArticles.Title: Tabs Content Resync
ResyncNewsArticles.Description: When you click on the below button, news articles belong to this business profile will be deleted and re-synced again.
ResyncNewsArticles.ConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to re-sync news articles for this business profile?
ResyncNewsArticles.Progress: Re-sync news articles for this business profile is running
ResyncNewsArticles.ResyncIsProcessingItCanTakeSomeTimeToFin: Re-sync is processing, it can take some time to finish.

ResyncUsers.Title: Users Resync
ResyncUsers.SyncAllUsersDescription: Resync all available users in tenant. This will sync every user with all news data

Dialog.MessageResyncUsers: Do you want to resync for these users?
Dialog.MessageResyncAllUsers: Do you want to resync all users in tenant? This will take some time to complete.

AzureIntune.Description: Enable using Azure Intunewith Omnia Feed app
